title: LinkedIn Post Scraper ($0.30/1k results)
description: Scrape public LinkedIn posts and articles without login. Extract content, author info, reactions, comments, and more.

url.title: LinkedIn Post URL
url.description: URL of the LinkedIn post or article to scrape (e.g., https://linkedin.com/pulse/... or https://linkedin.com/posts/...)

use_cache.title: Use Cache
use_cache.description: Use cached results if available to reduce costs

maximum_cache_age.title: Maximum Cache Age (seconds)
maximum_cache_age.description: Maximum age of cached results in seconds. Set to 0 to always fetch fresh data.
